Package util

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
util.Utils
public abstract class Utils extends Object
The Utils class provides various utility methods for the game.

    • rng

      public static int rng(int min, int max)
      Generates a random integer within the specified range.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value (inclusive).
      max - The maximum value (exclusive).
      Returns:
      The random integer.

    • pick

      public static <T> T pick(T[] arr)
      Picks a random element from an array.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of elements in the array.
      Parameters:
      arr - The array to pick from.
      Returns:
      The randomly picked element.

    • normalizePos

      public static int[] normalizePos(int x, int y)
      Normalizes the given coordinates to the nearest multiple of the tile dimension.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate.
      y - The y-coordinate.
      Returns:
      The normalized coordinates as an array [x, y].

    • normalizeEntityPos

      public static int[] normalizeEntityPos(Entity entity)
      Normalizes the position of the given entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to normalize.
      Returns:
      The normalized position of the entity as an array [x, y].

    • setTimeout

      public static void setTimeout(Runnable runnable, int delay)
      Executes the specified runnable after a delay, similar to the setTimeout function in JavaScript.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The runnable to execute.
      delay - The delay in milliseconds.

    • playSound

      public static Clip playSound(String src)
      Plays a sound from the specified path.
      Parameters:
      src - The path to the sound file.
      Returns:
      The Clip object representing the played sound.

    • loadImage

      public static BufferedImage loadImage(String src)
      Loads an image from the specified path.
      Parameters:
      src - The path to the image file.
      Returns:
      The loaded BufferedImage object.

      public static Font loadFont(float size)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The loaded Font object.

      Reads a level from the specified path and returns a grid representation.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
